message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we start our negotiation, I'm willing to offer you a price of $1200000. I believe this is a fair starting point, considering the product's value to you is $1500000. What do you think?

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I was hoping to get a better deal. Considering the product's value to me is $1500000, I'm willing to offer $1100000. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the value you place on the product is $1500000 as well.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. Considering the product's value to me is $1500000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1300000. I believe this is a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll see the value in this product. What do you think?
